notes.text:
I do not recommend this deck, is trash., but I like Ninjas and since SSA is not that common anymore, people stopped using Cyclone main deck so I decided to give it a shot.
The Karakuri card is a 3 stars monster that opens a lot of combos, for example use Duplication on Flame Armor Ninja to get the Karakuri and the 2 lvl 1, that destroys 1 monster and 2 backrow, then you can tribute etc. 
The deck is not so powerful as it used to be, I lost a bunch of promos to good Sylvan mills but at the end, we did it. 
Hextor Hokage out!
